slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.graph_candidate module

class slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.graph_candidate.GraphCandidate[source]

Bases: object

Graph candidate.

Contains a sequence of states and the time range of the graph candidate.

property time_range: TimeRange

Time range of the graph candidate.

property states: deque[State]

States of the graph candidate.

add(state: State) → None[source]

Adds a state to the graph candidate.

remove(state: State) → None[source]

Removes the state from the graph candidate.

remove_first() → None[source]

Removes the first state from the graph candidate.

remove_last() → None[source]

Removes the last state from the graph candidate.

clear() → None[source]

Clears the graph candidate.

_update_time_range() → TimeRange[source]

Updates the time range of the graph candidate.

Returns:

time range of the graph candidate.

Raises:

ValueError – if the graph candidate is empty.
